Title: Relates to authorizing certain persons in an optional twenty year retirement plan for state university police officer service, regional state park police and certain special investigators
Summary: Relates to authorizing certain persons in an optional twenty year retirement plan for state university police officer service, regional state park police and special investigators for the office of the attorney general.
LawCode: Amd ยง384-e, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to authorizing certain persons in an optional twenty year retirement plan for state university police officer service, regional state park police and special investigators for the office of the attorney general
